mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.name, a.href, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date FROM sys_menu a
mapper.select: JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.enabled = '1' AND r.del_flag = '0' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.sort
LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND rm.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, icon, sort, is_show, permission, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE CONCAT('%', #{id}, ',%')
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort
